classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phenylbenzamines. These are aromatic compounds consisting of a benzyl group that is N-linked to a benzamine.

drug-interaction.name: Benzylpenicilloyl polylysine
drug-interaction.description: Bamipine may decrease effectiveness of Benzylpenicilloyl polylysine as a diagnostic agent.

drug-interaction.name: Betahistine
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Betahistine can be decreased when used in combination with Bamipine.

drug-interaction.name: Hyaluronidase (ovine)
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Hyaluronidase (ovine) can be decreased when used in combination with Bamipine.
